Detailed Description

Planner which tries to move around the ball to intercept it.

Member Function Documentation

◆ plan()

Trajectory planning::SettlePlanner::plan ( const PlanRequest &  request)
overridevirtual

Plan a trajectory for this request. This is guaranteed to be a request that this planner is able to handle (according to is_applicable)

Parameters
requestThe request to plan.
Returns
A trajectory for the robot to follow.

Implements planning::Planner.

◆ reset()

void planning::SettlePlanner::reset ( )
overridevirtual

Reset this planner. Called after the planner is not used to handle a given command for the robot.
